description.value:
This wand is composed of ash that has been compressed, shaped, and sealed with a clear lacquer. When you trace the wand's tip along a solid surface, it leaves a black trail of charcoal. Writing with the wand in this way never damages or wears the wand down.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Disintegrate]. If the spell reduces a living creature to fine powder, you animate that creature's ashes into a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-3.Actor.Sulfur Zombie] with the same general appearance as the disintegrated creature. You control this sulfur zombie, which gains the minion and summoned traits. You can issue a verbal command to the sulfur zombie as a single action with the auditory and concentrate traits. The sulfur zombie crumbles into inanimate ash when reduced to 0 Hit Points or after 1 minute, whichever comes first.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Disintegrate].
